Items.Title: Application number C 220426 ZMR (541-545 Bay Street) submitted by Epsilon Enterprises Realty, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 21c, changing from a C4-2 District to an R6 District, establishing within a proposed R6 District a C2-3 District, and establishing a Special Bay Street Corridor District (BSC), Borough of Staten Island, Community District 1, Council District 49.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 541-545 Bay Street, Staten Island (C 220426 ZMR)

Items.Title: Application number N 220392 ZRR (541-545 Bay Street) submitted by Epsilon Enterprises Realty, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying Article XIII, Chapter 5 (Special Bay Street Corridor District) to create a new Subdistrict and APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Staten Island, Community District 1, Council District 49.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 541-545 Bay Street, Staten Island (N 220392 ZRR)

Items.Title: Application number C 220426 ZMR (541-545 Bay Street) submitted by Epsilon Enterprises Realty, LLC, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 21c, changing from a C4-2 District to an R6 District, establishing within a proposed R6 District a C2-3 District, and establishing a Special Bay Street Corridor District (BSC), Borough of Staten Island, Community District 1, Council District 49.
